name: dating-app-sms-lambda
description: AWS Lambda function for SMS sending via multiple providers

scripts.create-function: aws lambda create-function --function-name SendSMSFunction --runtime nodejs18.x --role arn:aws:iam::YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID:role/LambdaExecutionRole --handler send_sms_function.handler --zip-file fileb://send_sms_function.zip --timeout 30 --memory-size 256

author: Dating App Development Team
